#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  long long t,i,n,j,x,y;
    char a[100005],b[100005],c,d,count,temp;
 cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  {
    
      
      cin>>a>>b;
      sort(a,a+strlen(a));
      sort(b,b+strlen(b));
      if(strcmp(a,b)==0)
          cout<<"YES"<<endl;
      else
          cout<<"NO"<<endl;
      
  }
   
    
}
